mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOTO_SPORTS( SPORTS_GUBUN, SPORTS_LEAGUE_NAME, SPORTS_TEAM1_NAME, SPORTS_TEAM2_NAME, SPORTS_SCHEDULE, SPORTS_TEAM1_BET, SPORTS_TEAM2_BET, SPORTS_DRAW_BET, REG_CUST_NO, REG_DT, REG_IP, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{sportsGubun}, #{sportsLeagueName}, #{sportsTeam1Name}, #{sportsTeam2Name}, #{sportsSchedule}, #{sportsTeam1Bet}, #{sportsTeam2Bet}, #{sportsDrawBet}, #{regCustNo}, NOW(), #{regIp}, 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(IF(TSB.BETTING_TEAM_CHOICE = TS.SPORTS_RESULT, 0, 1)) as sportsResult FROM TOTO_SPORTS_BETTING TSB INNER JOIN TOTO_SPORTS_BETTING_GROUP TSBG ON TSB.SPORTS_BETTING_GROUP_NO = TSBG.SPORTS_BETTING_GROUP_NO AND TSBG.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TSBG.FAMILY_CUST_NO = #{familyCustNo} INNER JOIN TOTO_SPORTS TS ON TS.SPORTS_NO = TSB.SPORTS_NO AND TS.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE TSB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TSB.FAMILY_CUST_NO = #{familyCustNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TOTO_SPORTS_BETTING ( FAMILY_CUST_NO, SPORTS_NO, SPORTS_BETTING_GROUP_NO, BETTING_TEAM_CHOICE, BETTING_BET, REG_CUST_NO, REG_DT, REG_IP, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{familyCustNo}, #{sportsNo}, #{sportsBettingGroupNo}, #{bettingTeamChoice}, #{bettingBet}, #{regCustNo}, NOW(), #{regIp}, 'Y' )
mapper.select:
SELECT
SPORTS_TEAM1_BET as sportsTem1Bet
SPORTS_TEAM2_BET as sportsTem2Bet
SPORTS_DRAW_BET as sportsDrawBet
FROM TOTO_SPORTS WHERE SPORTS_NO = #{sportsNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND SPORTS_RESULT IS NULL

SELECT TS.SPORTS_NO as sportsNo , TS.SPORTS_TEAM1_NAME AS sportsTeam1Name , TS.SPORTS_TEAM2_NAME as sportsTeam2Name , TS.SPORTS_SCHEDULE as sportsSchedule , TS.SPORTS_TEAM1_BET as sportsTeam1Bet , TS.SPORTS_DRAW_BET as sportsDrawBet , TS.SPORTS_TEAM2_BET as sportsTeam2Bet , TS.SPORTS_LEAGUE_NAME as sportsLeagueName , TS.SPORTS_SCORE1 as sportsScore1 , TS.SPORTS_SCORE2 as sportsScore2 , TS.SPORTS_RESULT as sportsResult , TSB.BETTING_TEAM_CHOICE as bettingTeamChoice FROM TOTO_SPORTS TS LEFT OUTER JOIN TOTO_SPORTS_BETTING TSB ON TS.SPORTS_NO = TSB.SPORTS_NO AND TSB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TSB.FAMILY_CUST_NO = #{familyCustNo} WHERE TS.SPORTS_GUBUN = 'ISO' AND TS.SPORTS_LEAGUE_NAME = 'K리그1' AND TS.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SPORTS_SCHEDULE ASC, TS.SPORTS_RESULT DESC;
SELECT SPORTS_NO as sportsNo FROM TOTO_SPORTS_BETTING WHERE FAMILY_CUST_NO = #{familyCustNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT TSBG.BETTING_GROUP_BET as bettingGroupBet , IF(BETTING_TEAM_CHOICE = SPORTS_RESULT, '1', '0') AS bettingGroupResult , SPORTS_RESULT as sportsResult FROM TOTO_SPORTS_BETTING_GROUP TSBG INNER JOIN TOTO_SPORTS_BETTING TSB ON TSBG.SPORTS_BETTING_GROUP_NO = TSB.SPORTS_BETTING_GROUP_NO AND TSB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TSB.FAMILY_CUST_NO = #{familyCustNo} AND TSB.SPORTS_BETTING_GROUP_NO = #{sportsBettingGroupNo} LEFT OUTER JOIN TOTO_SPORTS TS ON TS.SPORTS_NO = TSB.SPORTS_NO AND TS.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE TSBG.FAMILY_CUST_NO = #{familyCustNo} AND TSBG.USE_YN = 'Y'
